Class KeyboardInput

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      KeyboardInput

public class KeyboardInput
extends greenfoot.Actor

The KeyboardInput Class takes into user input and displays it It then checks it against a list of words displaying it in different colors It also calls a specific fuction in a nother calss passing along the word that was entered

Version:
2019-09-18
Author:
Josh Beatty

 void act()
          Every frame save the input and add it to the text variable if it is a valid character it also displays text based on how much of it is correct
